name: 256b checkerboard zoom
author: psonice
description: Always loved this effect in the old amiga demos, so tried to make it in 256 chars as a fun challenge.
image_code:
#define r iResolution
void mainImage(out vec4 c,vec2 f){vec2 u=f.xy/r.xy-.5,s;u.y*=r.y/r.x;float y=-iTime,p,t,d;for(float i=0.;i<8.;i+=2.){t=mod(y+i,8.);d=t*t;s=floor(mod((u+vec2(sin(-y*1.57),cos(y*1.57))/d)*d,2.));d=s.x+s.y-1.;c=max(c,d*d/t-.1);}}
